name: Mirlo Above the Sun
description:
Mirlo: Above the Sun is a project developed by Kaiju In The Bayou, a team of 4th Year students at DigiPen Institute of Technology Europe - Bilbao in a 9-month development cycle using Unreal Engine 4. More insights into the project (i.e. art concepts, dev builds, presentations... etc) can be found in their social media:
  • Twitter: https://twitter.com/Kaijuinthebayou
  • Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kaijuinthebayou
  • Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCPchZYbTU4WdkE3sW5X1Xyw

Programming Department:
  • Kerman Munitxa - Gameplay Programmer & Producer
  • Mikel Sertutxa - Gameplay Programmer & Designer
  • Beñat Morisset - Gameplay Programmer & Designer
  • Oscar Sanchez - UI/UX Programmer
  • Mateo Couso - Gameplay Programmer
  • Ander Najera - Gameplay Programmer

Art Department:
  • Iñigo Arrieta - Enemy/Environment Artist
  • Amaia Bonachera - Producer, Rigger, & Animator
  • Ibon Andollo - Characters, Tech Artist, & Designer
  • Carlota Garcia - Concept, Texture, & UI/UX Artist
  • Aintzane Arribas - Concept/Environment Artist & Animator
